quote: The heart dies a slow death, shedding each hope like leaves until one day there are none. No hopes. Nothing remains.
author: Arthur Golden

quote: Donâ€™t ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I hid my deepest feelings so well I forgot where I placed them.
author: Amy Tan

quote: You see I usually find myself among strangers because I drift here and there trying to forget the sad things that happened to me.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
